name: Backrooms: Social Experiment
description:
Backrooms: Social Experiment Unique Features! -

  1. Explore three handcrafted levels of the Backrooms
  2. An interactive quiz where you venture forth through each backrooms level answering questions to determine your fate
  3. This game has Multiple Endings that can change depending on your answers!
  4. Affects the outcome of our main Backrooms Exploration Game
  5. This game sets up the story for our main Backrooms Exploration Game and explains the backstory behind our Backrooms
